entity.description: Database migration practices based on current implementation: 1) Use sqlx migrate for all schema changes 2) Migrations in migrations/ directory with timestamp prefixes 3) SQLCipher encryption for all databases 4) Transaction-based migrations with proper rollback 5) Schema changes must be backward compatible where possible 6) Foreign key constraints properly defined 7) Indexes for performance-critical queries 8) Migration testing in separate test database 9) Current schema: 6 migrations covering profiles, activities, filtering, terminal monitoring, network activity

requirements.description: Use sqlx migrate add for creating new migrations, name migrations descriptively (YYYYMMDD_HHMMSS_description.sql), include both UP and DOWN migration scripts, test migrations on sample data before deployment
requirements.title: Migration File Organization
